definition: cord fabric used in vehicle tires
flag used as a shop sign/variant of 簾|帘[lian2]
cloth/to declare/to announce/to spread/to make known

sentences.english: The development of modified dipped nylon 66 cord and its application were described.
sentences.chinese: 介绍改性锦纶66浸渍帘布的研制与应用情况。

sentences.english: I used an old curtain found at my favorite antique shop!
sentences.chinese: 我在最喜欢的复古杂货店里找到这块旧窗帘布。

sentences.english: This embroidery weaving system is aimed at producing fabrics for e. g. curtains and shirting.
sentences.chinese: 此台绣花织布机主要用于织造窗帘布和衬衫面料等。

sentences.english: The pair of sidewalls comprises part of the carcass ply structure.
sentences.chinese: 一对侧壁包括部分胎体帘布层结构。

sentences.english: At the windows she had chocolate curtains.
sentences.chinese: 窗户上，她用的是深褐色窗帘布。

sentences.english: The full automatic measurement of edge of cord fabric for meridian tyre and discussion on positioning method are introduced?
sentences.chinese: 介绍全自动子午胎帘布裁断机布边测量及其定位方法。

sentences.english: She hung the window with curtains.
Got the tail section built and sheeted .
sentences.chinese: 得到的尾巴第兴建和帘布。

definition: hanging screen/curtain over shop door (for privacy and serving as advertisement)
flag used as a shop sign/variant of 簾|帘[lian2]
window/the opening panel of a window
to push aside (clothing, curtain etc) to reveal something/to toss aside
door/the opening panel of a door
